author: fielding
msg: Julian incorporated my changes (and a few more).

author: fielding
msg: Several changes to bring this closer to RFC editor output:
o Added '.' after section numbers for TOC and section title.
o Authors' Addresses moved after appendices in RFC and TOC.
o s/Author's/Authors'/ for more than one author.
and output Verdana font first (Helvetica is not a screen font).

author: fielding
msg: nroff version of almost-final RFC, hand-coded to fix xml2rfc bugs

author: fielding
msg: Approved by IESG, converted to RFC status (no number assigned yet)
